name: SPACE PENGUINS (itch)
description:
This is my submission for the GMTK Game Jam with the theme "Only One".

The game is an auto moving puzzle platformer where you will only need the key "Space" to play to activate the one and specific abilitie for each Penguin to complete the levels.

[Controls]

[Space] - Activate power:

Blue: Jump

Green: Activate/Deactivate Green Blocks

Yellow: Charge

Red: Stop

Thank you for playing
